title: Yu-Gi-Oh! - Chaos Goddess (TSHD-EN044) - The Shining Darkness - 1st Edition - Secret Rare
features: A single individual card from the Yu-Gi-Oh! trading and collectible card game (TCG/CCG).
This is of Secret Rare rarity.
From the The Shining Darkness set.
You will receive the 1st Edition version of this card.
description: Yu-Gi-Oh! is a strategic trading card game in two players Duel each other using a variety of Monster, Spell, and Trap Cards to defeat their opponent's monsters and be the first to drop the other's Life Points to 0.

: 1 LIGHT Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner DARK monsters. Once per turn, you can send 1 LIGHT monster from your hand to the Graveyard to select 1 Level 5 or higher DARK monster from your Graveyard. Special Summon that monster. It cannot be used as a Synchro Material monster.
